C

calculateCommision() - Method in class taxi.model.Route
calculateCommision method This method calculates the commission based on the cost of the route.
calculateDistanceInKilometer(double, double, double, double) - Method in class taxi.utils.CoordinateCalc
calculateDistanceInKilometer method This method implements the calculation of the distance between to sets of coordinates
cancelRequest(Customer, Request) - Method in class taxi.service.RequestHandlingService
cancelRequest method This method gets as parameters: the request object made by the customer and the customer object which cancels the request The method: Assumes that customer can only cancel a request he already made and it is not already canceled or done Updates the status of request to CANCELED Informs taxi driver that the request has been canceled
changeAddress(String, long, String, String, int) - Method in class taxi.service.EditAccountService
changeAddress method, applicable for both Taxi Driver and Customer This method gets as parameters: the usertype (Customer or Taxi Driver) the userid the new address the new city and the new zip code The appropriate record is fetched from the DB.
changeCreditCard(String, long, String, String, String, String) - Method in class taxi.service.EditAccountService
changeCreditCard method, applicable for both Taxi Driver and Customer This method gets as parameters: the usertype (Customer or Taxi Driver) the userid the new creditCardType the new creditCardNumber the new expiryDate and the new ccv The appropriate record is fetched from the DB.
changeEmail(String, long, String) - Method in class taxi.service.EditAccountService
changeEmail method, applicable for both Taxi Driver and Customer This method gets as parameters: the usertype (Customer or Taxi Driver) the userid the new email The appropriate record is fetched from the DB.
CoordinateCalc - Class in taxi.utils
The CoordinateCalc class implements the calculation of the distance between to sets of coordinates
CoordinateCalc() - Constructor for class taxi.utils.CoordinateCalc
 
createEvaluation(Route, int, String) - Method in class taxi.service.EvaluationService
Evaluation method createEvaluation gets as inputs the route, which customer evaluates, the rating and comment we assume rating can be zero Since the evaluation is done when calling this method, the user has no access to the date, the system gives always the current date we check that none of the inputs is empty/null (except of rating) and that the request related with this request is in status done we create the object evaluation using the inputs and inserted in the DB then we connect this evaluation with the related route then we retrieve the taxi object from within the request and search to find its driver we will use this object to contact the driver, in order to inform him that an evaluation was submitted for a route he completed
createRoute(Request, String, String, String, String, int, int) - Method in class taxi.service.RequestHandlingService
createRoute method This method gets as parameters: the request object made by the customer, the origin address, the origin city, the origin zip code, the destination address, the destination city and the destination zip code This method creates a route with information given by the customer.
createTaxi(String, String, String, String, double, double) - Method in class taxi.service.RegistrationService
createTaxi method This method gets as parameters: the carModel the carType the licensePlate the carModelDate the latitude the longtitude The method: Validates the license plate Validates the car model date Creates the new taxi object and inserts it in the DB Finally it returns the new object Note: It is assumed that coordinates are fetched from GPS
Customer - Class in taxi.model
The Customer class implements all customers using the taxi service.
Customer() - Constructor for class taxi.model.Customer
The default constructor
Customer(String, String, String, String, String, Date, double, double, String, String, int, String, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class taxi.model.Customer
The main constructor
